name: All About The Jelly
description:
A silly and fun little Jello physics simulation made in 3 hours.

download the source - https://github.com/harshhh-dev/jelly-simulation-unity

Tools used:

Unity 2019.4

Blender 2.8

Links to resources:

(Music) - youtube.com/watch?v=7lqpOlVYtD0

(Jelly Simulation Tutorial) - youtube.com/watch?v=UxLJ6XewTVs&t=229s

(Jelly Model - optimized separately in blender) - blendswap.com/blend/3007
